Do you pay for childcare? Do you want to save for retirement? Or you wish you had more money to put away for your kids' college expenses? Find out how our tax cuts help hard working families like yours. Read my op-ed in @azcentral ↓https://www.azcentral.com/story/opinion/op-ed/2017/11/17/mcsally-why-voted-house-tax-reform-bill/874213001/ …
America is a nation of immigrants, but we should welcome immigrants based on merit—not chance. →https://goo.gl/mM1nkS

In a world of advancing & intensifying globalized terror, it makes no sense that the US forgoes our right to choose who we admit & instead blindly picks people at random. Let's end this dangerous & flawed program and create more merit-based visas → 
https://goo.gl/mM1nkS

New State Department data reveals that since 2007 nearly 29,000 foreign nationals from Syria, Sudan & Iran (3 state-sponsors of terrorism) have become legal immigrants through the diversity lottery program. 
What I'm doing about it →
 https://goo.gl/mM1nkS

It's time to scrap the poorly designed and fraudulent prone Diversity Visa Lottery Program. We can make our country safer while still opening our doors to people who will work hard towards a better future for their families and our country.

https://mcsally.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/us-rep-mcsally-moves-eliminate-diversity-visa-lottery-program …
Taxpayers deserve a tax code that is simpler, flatter and fairer, so that every American family and employer can file their taxes without paying astronomical compliance costs.
